Uses of Class
entities.Order

  • Packages that use Order 
    Package Description
    clientGui
    this package contains all the gui files on the client side.
    clientIO
    this package contains all the input/output files on the client side.
    clientLogic
    this package contains the logic for orders that can't be accepted
    serverLogic
    this package contains all the logic files on the server side.

    • Uses of Order in clientLogic

      Methods in clientLogic that return Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Order OpenOrderTimes.askForWaitingListAndShowOptions(Order ord)
      ask the user is he want to enter the waiting list.
      if he want add his order to the waiting list, and navigate to home(return null)
      if he want to see another time in the same day is shows the available times, let the user to choose the times.
      if cancel button clicked return null.
      else return the order with the visit time changed to the choosen time
      Methods in clientLogic with parameters of type Order 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Order OpenOrderTimes.askForWaitingListAndShowOptions(Order ord)
      ask the user is he want to enter the waiting list.
      if he want add his order to the waiting list, and navigate to home(return null)
      if he want to see another time in the same day is shows the available times, let the user to choose the times.
      if cancel button clicked return null.
      else return the order with the visit time changed to the choosen time
      private static java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime> OpenOrderTimes.getOpenOrderTimes(Order ord)
      given Order find all the available times to the Order
